post:
[PrimaHost](https://primahost.info) offered new SSD KVM plans in Germany, France and USA.  Our VPS’s support a wide range of Operating Systems such as Ubuntu, Debian, CentOS and Windows Server. We accept payments via PayPal, credit/debit cards (via Stipe) and Webmoney.  
  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;**SSD-384**  
• CPU: 1 vCore  
• RAM: 384MB  
• Hard Drive: 5GB SSD  
• Swap: 384MB  
• IP addresses: 1 IPv4, 2 IPv6  
• Port Speed: 1Gbit  
• Bandwidth: 1TB  
• OS: **Linux**  
• Features: _**Anti-DDoS**_ (Germany/France)  
• Control Panel: SolusVM  
• 2,7 €/mo. | $3/mo.  
• [Order Link](https://www.primahost.info/cart.php?a=add&pid=59)
